definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites
not to reciprocate is against etiquette (classical)/to respond in kind
pinyin: lai2 er2 bu4 wang3 fei1 li3 ye3

sentences.english: Because you are accepting others' help all the time , you should reciprocate them.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你是接受別人的幫助所有的時候，你應該非禮也。

sentences.english: He stared at me, " what, the others heard thought I want incivility you."
sentences.chinese: 他瞪我，亂叫什麼啊，別人聽到還以爲我要非禮你呢。

sentences.english: Framed BaoGuMing molested her strange flower, is simple BaoGuMing decided to resign.
sentences.chinese: 奇葩誣陷鮑家明非禮她，鮑家明決定辭職。

sentences.english: Women often dream about fending off unwanted advances, or of being sexually assaulted.
sentences.chinese: 女人經常會夢見自己在抵抗非禮行爲或性騷擾。

sentences.english: This is the beginning of the scene of propriety.
sentences.chinese: 這纔有了一開始的非禮那一幕。

definition: to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
to disturb/to cause a commotion/to harass
